name: Get Outta Here! (LandAquaman)
description:
Epic Game Jam 2021 Submission on "Running out of Space". 

WASD + Space

Q + E

LMB, RMB, Scroll

Fonts from FontMeme, human animations from Mixamo, Bp_SkySphere, sand textures from Megascans, sound assets from WeLoveIndies, everything else was made by me during the game jam.
